channel.title: Creative Commons - Music and ND
channel.description:
What I hate about CC is the fact that most music tracks are tagged by ND (No Derived Work), because besides the fact, that you aren't allowed to make any modifications, this also denies the use of it as background music in videos, custom maps or other work.
My question is, whether someone knows any websites that provide CC (or completely free) music, without that restriction (tracks with the Sampling-License for example)
Thanks!

item.title: Creative Commons - Music and ND
item.dc:creator: Psyborg
item.description:
Jamendo is a good archive that lets you sort by the type of CC.

Read full topic
